title: Legal Policy Updates
summary: The newsletter covers various legal updates, including policies on e-mail and internet monitoring, election laws, ADA implications, and case decisions. Key points include the enforcement of company policies for e-mail use, the impact of recent PERC decisions, changes to election procedures, and restrictions on individual ADA liability.
compressed_content: Firehouse Lawyer discusses e-mail and internet policies with a focus on enforcement. E-mailed and internet activities must be monitored for company compliance. Case highlights ADA implications regarding individual liability. PerC decision reinforces past practices in union-related policies. Updated election laws require advance notice for special elections. ADA ruling prohibits individual lawsuits, emphasizing employer responsibility. Recommendations include consistent policy enforcement and ensuring employer participation.
